title: My pixel 4a won't charge, please help. the phone has no phisical damage but it won't charge
content: I can't charge my phone, I just bought it, there is no phisical damage what so ever. it started when it said it detected liquid damage then it said it was ok then it got back saying there was liquid damage again. now its at 0% its shut down by itself and it wont charge. only the screen would indicate it was charge and the disconect, effectively a BRICKED phone now. please help
